questions.title: How often do you perform activities that require bending or twisting of your torso, such as gardening or golf? *
How often do you perform racquet sports? *
How often do you perform heavy weight training? *
How often do you perform aerobics or running? *
How often do you ride motorcycles, ATVs, personal watercraft (Jet Skis), or snowmobiles? *
How often do you go alpine skiing, surfing or windsurfing? *
How often do you perform needle work, or play the piano, or computer games? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include forceful pinching or gripping? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include repetitive elbow motion? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include repetitive neck motion? *
Do your hobbies or work activties require or include the use of your hands above your mid-chest? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include bending at the waist? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include squatting, bending, climbing or stooping? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include lifting, pushing or carrying more than 50 pounds? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include sitting for more than 30 minutes at a time? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include computer use? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require you to maintain awkward positions? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include the use of power sanders, drills, saws or other vibrating tools? *
Do your hobbies or work activities require or include exposure to extreme temperatures?  This is defined as less than 30 degrees or over  100 degrees? *
